p: PDCoV was first discovered in Hong Kong, and has since been reported in many countries, including the USA, Canada, Korea, China, Thailand, Laos, and Vietnam [ 4â€“ 9]. In China, PDCoV had been reported in many provinces, but little has been reported regarding the prevalence and epidemiology of PDCoV in Sichuan province, a major pig-raising province of China. Thus, in this study, we investigated the prevalence of PDCoV in diarrhoeal pigs and analysed the complete genome sequences of PDCoV isolates from Sichuan, China.
